<figure data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92"><img data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" src="https://36.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_nltoan3vs41rr2wit_500.jpg"/></figure><br/><object bgcolor="#000000" data="http://www.twitch.tv/swflibs/TwitchPlayer.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="620"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/swflibs/TwitchPlayer.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="channel=giantwaffle&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&videoId=v3947423&device_id=01b2d5bad1ea506d"></object><br/><br/>

DasValdez proposed a challenge to Giantwaffle: take off from Kerbin, land on Mun and Minmus and then return to the home planet. Despite a shaky start Giantwaffle managed to get it done in the end.

<br/><br/>

Well done!

It says the audio is copyrighted?

Only the very end of his stream, he plays and outro song.
Does anyone have 5.5 hrs to spare to watch this?
